FROM [dbo].[Countries] AS [c]

[2025-09-23 13:13:40.392 -04:00 INF] Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Database.Command Executed DbCommand (2ms) [Parameters=[@__Select_0='?' (Size = 4000)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [c].[CountryId], [c].[CountryName], [c].[ISO2], [c].[ISO3], [c].[IsActive]
FROM [dbo].[Countries] AS [c]
WHERE [c].[ISO2] IS NOT NULL AND [c].[ISO2] IN (
